mapper.select: select from BUILDING_SET_ROOM_LAYOUT where COMP_ID = 0 and BUILDING_SET_ROOM_ID = #{buildingSetRoomId}
mapper.insert: insert into BUILDING_SET_ROOM_LAYOUT (CITY_ID, COMP_ID, BUILD_ID, BUILDING_SET_ROOM_ID, CREATED_TIME, LAYOUT_URL, UPDATED_TIME, DEL_FLAG) SELECT CITY_ID, COMP_ID, BUILD_ID, #{needAddLayoutRoomId}, GETDATE(), LAYOUT_URL, GETDATE(), DEL_FLAG FROM BUILDING_SET_ROOM_LAYOUT WHERE COMP_ID = 0 AND BUILD_ID = #{buildId} AND BUILDING_SET_ROOM_ID = #{buildingSetRoomId}
